DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Skin Morbidity Score Score Criterion Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Acute radiation morbidity scoring criteria value for skin

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Emission or propagation of electromagnetic energy (waves/rays), or the waves/rays themselves; a stream of electromagnetic particles (electrons, neutrons, protons, alpha particles) or a mixture of these. The most common source is the sun._An organ that constitutes the external surface of the body.  It consists of the epidermis, dermis, and skin appendages._A disease or the incidence of disease within a population. Morbidity also refers to adverse effects caused by a treatment._A numeric or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, or ability. Scores are used to aid in the diagnosis and treatment of a condition. In addition, scores may be part of the inclusion or exclusion criteria of a clinical trial protocol. (NCI)

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Emission or propagation of electromagnetic energy (waves/rays), or the waves/rays themselves; a stream of electromagnetic particles (electrons, neutrons, protons, alpha particles) or a mixture of these. The most common source is the sun.:An organ that constitutes the external surface of the body.  It consists of the epidermis, dermis, and skin appendages.:A disease or the incidence of disease within a population. Morbidity also refers to adverse effects caused by a treatment.

Concepts.definition: Emission or propagation of electromagnetic energy (waves/rays), or the waves/rays themselves; a stream of electromagnetic particles (electrons, neutrons, protons, alpha particles) or a mixture of these. The most common source is the sun.
An organ that constitutes the external surface of the body. It consists of the epidermis, dermis, and skin appendages.
Morbidity; the relative incidence of a particular disease in a population.

Property.preferredDefinition: A numeric or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, or ability. Scores are used to aid in the diagnosis and treatment of a condition. In addition, scores may be part of the inclusion or exclusion criteria of a clinical trial protocol. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A numeric or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, or ability. Scores are used to aid in the diagnosis and treatment of a condition. In addition, scores may be part of the inclusion or exclusion criteria of a clinical trial protocol. (NCI)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the outcome or resolution of the patient's adverse events.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.: A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one.

PermissibleValues.value: Score 3 - Confluent, moist desquamation other than skin folds, pitting edema

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.

PermissibleValues.value: Score 2 - Tender or bright erythema, patchy moist desquamation, moderate edema

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.: A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.

PermissibleValues.value: Score  1 - Follicular, faint or dull erythema, epilation, dry desquamation, decreased sweating

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.: A mathematical element that when added to another number yields the same number; the cardinal number meaning one less than one.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
A mathematical element that when added to another number yields the same number; the cardinal number meaning one less than one.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.:That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.:Value; a numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
